#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
        while(1)
        {   char str[100];
            gets(str);
            if(str[0]=='#')
            break;

            int len=strlen(str);
            int i;
            for(i=0;i<len;i++)
            {   if(str[i]==' ')
                cout<<"%20";
                else if(str[i]=='!')
                cout<<"%21";
                 else if(str[i]=='$')
                cout<<"%24";
                 else if(str[i]=='%')
                cout<<"%25";
                 else if(str[i]=='(')
                cout<<"%28";
                 else if(str[i]==')')
                cout<<"%29";
                 else if(str[i]=='*')
                cout<<"%2a";
                else
                cout<<str[i];

            }
            cout<<"\n";



        }
        return 0;
}
